ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RecordTypeId = "012a0000001NZsU", RecordTypeId ="012a0000001NZsV" , RecordTypeId ="01213000001NdrN"), $User.ProfileId != "00e300000019nDA",$User.ProfileId != "00e130000024PsX", $User.ProfileId != "00e30000001lhnq", NOT(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name , "PL RSM")), if(ISCHANGED(Status__c),true,false))
